query:
SELECT 
  DATE(date) as day,
  SUM(total) as total_revenue,
  COUNT(*) as records
FROM daily_revenues 
WHERE date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
GROUP BY DATE(date)
ORDER BY day DESC
LIMIT 10;
